page.title: 12FUN ON N.CAVE BUILDING SITE
page.content: "Come on Suggy, let's go down to Skipo's" "All right, we can maybe lark army as well" "Shall we call for Anne?" "Only if Skipo's playing" "Let's go then". "Are you larking Dave?" "Okay"said Dave"let's go and knock for Anne" "Are you playing"said Suggy, "Sure, just wait a minute while I get my bike" Anne replied. All four of us went to our den and then to Jacko's to see him scramble on the building site. Jacko said"Shall we have a course like "Kick Start" "Okay" said Dave. James went first and got bogged down and finally Ally fell in the mud. We all laughed but I don't think his mum did. Anne stalled and she was last. We all had a great afternoon and bought a Mr. Freeze icepop from the paper shop.
